message.content:
I need to identify the line item related to bank deposits and extract its initial and final values.

Looking at the balance sheet provided in the problem, I can see there is a line item specifically labeled "Bank Deposits":

| Account | Initial_amount | Initial_date | End_amount | End_date |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Bank Deposits | 5000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 559055.66 | 2024-02-01 |

From this line item:
- The initial value of the bank deposits is 5000000.00 as of 2023-12-31
- The end value of the bank deposits is 559055.66 as of 2024-02-01

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '5000000.00', 'end value': '559055.66'}}
```
